contentheadline.headline: University of Puerto Rico at Humacao

contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox University |name = University of Puerto Rico at Humacao |native_name = |image_name = UPR_at_Humacao.svg |image_size = |caption = Seal of the University of Puerto Rico at Humacao |latin_name = |motto = |tagline = |established = 1962 |closed = |vision = |type = [[Public university|Public]] |affiliation = |calendar = |endowment = |debt = |rector = [[Carmen J. Hernández Cruz]] |officer_in_charge = |chairman = |chancellor = |president = |vice-president = |superintendent = |provost = |vice_chancellor = |principal = |dean = |director = |head_label = |head = |faculty = 336 |staff = |students = |undergrad = 4,732 |postgrad = |doctoral = |divinity = |residents = |other = |profess = |alumni = |city = [[Humacao]] |state = |province = |country = [[Puerto Rico]] |address = |telephone = |coor = |campus = [[urban area|Urban]], 62 [[acre]]s |free_label = |free = |sports = |colors = |colours = |nickname = |mascot = El Búho (Owl) |fightsong = |athletics = |affiliations = |nobel_laureates = |website = [http://www.uprh.edu www.uprh.edu] |logo = |publictransit = |footnotes = }} The '''University of Puerto Rico at Humacao''' ('''UPRH''' or '''UPR-Humacao''') is a [[State university system|state university]] located in the municipality of [[Humacao, Puerto Rico|Humacao]], [[Puerto Rico]]. The campus is home to the UPRH Observatory. ==Academics== The University of Puerto Rico at Humacao (UPRH) lies in the east of the island, highlighting the chemical-pharmaceutical and electronics as well as several areas of ecological and tourist value. To meet the demand for labor in that region UPRH offers baccalaureate programs unique in the UPR system in: * Industrial Chemistry * [[Computational Mathematics]] * [[Physics]] Applied to [[Electronics]] * Coastal [[Marine Biology]] * Wildlife Management Plus: * Bachelor in [[Microbiology]] and [[General Biology]] * Baccalaureate and Associate Degree in [[Nursing]] Sciences * Bachelor of [[Education]] * Bachelor of [[Social Sciences]] * Bachelor of [[Social Work]] * Bachelor of [[Business Administration]] * Associate Degree in [[Physical Therapy]] * Associate Degree in [[Occupational Therapy]] The UPRH successful has been the scene of the Dove Project Sabanera, native species threatened with extinction, Project Moonboogie for designing a lunar vehicle and maintains the Microbial Observatory of the Salinas of Cabo Rojo sponsored by the [[National Science Foundation]].<ref>"[http://www.uprh.edu/oi.htmUPRH About Us]." ''University of Puerto Rico Humacao Campus'' Spanish. Retrieved on November 30, 2010.</ref> == Campus Population == * Students: 4,592 * Faculty: 336 == Academic Departments == *[http://www.uprh.edu/~adem Administration] *[http://www1.uprh.edu/biologia Biology] *[http://www1.uprh.edu/quimica Chemistry] *[http://www.uprh.edu/~video/departamento/departamento.htm Communications] *[http://www1.uprh.edu/huma Humanities] *[http://mate.uprh.edu/ Mathematics] *[http://www1.uprh.edu/enfe Nursing Science] *[http://www1.uprh.edu/fisica Physics & Electronics] *[http://www1.uprh.edu/tfisica Physical Therapy] *[http://www1.uprh.edu/to Ocupational Therapy] *[http://www1.uprh.edu/tsoc Social Sciences] <ref>"[http://www.uprh.edu/catalogo/english/e_ToC.pdf UPRH Catalog]." ''University of Puerto Rico Humacao Campus'' Spanish.
